summary: Standalone Magic Oriented Followers - including my Mystia, Nera, and Vega
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Verdana][color=#ff7700][size=6]PRACTICAL MAGIC FOLLOWER PACK[/size][/color][/font]

[size=3]Featuring [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/78628/?]Mystia[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/78254/?]Nera[/url], and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77469/?]Vega[/url][/size]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/grrlshypz/20160909232014_1.jpg[/img]

[font=Verdana]*Combination Pack of the three followers with added perks*

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/kwe5vkyrr/Info.png[/img]
Name:  [u]Mystia[/u]
Race:  Nord
Voice:  Female Sultry
Marriageable:  Yes
Weight:  80
Skin:  Fair Skin Optimized
Body:  UNP & CBBE
Location:  Whiterun - Arcadia's Cauldron (Usually Upstairs)
Armor:  Sotteta Necromancer
Weapon:  None

Name:  [u]Nera[/u]
Race:  Dark Elf
Voice:  Female Dark Elf
Marriageable:  Yes
Weight:  .89
Skin:  Fair Skin Optimized
Body:  UNP & CBBE
Location:  Windhelm - New Gnisis Cornerclub
Armor:  R18Pn09 - Shanoa Armor
Weapon:  Axestaff

Name:  [u]Vega[/u]
Race:  Breton/Vampire
Voice:  Female Sultry
Marriageable:  Yes
Weight:  100
Skin:  Fair Skin
Body:  UNP & CBBE
Location:  Morthal - Moorside Inn
Armor:  Daedric Reaper Armor
Weapon:  Deadric

Various Magic Related Perks (Varies Per Follower)

ENB:  RealVision & Vividian
Tested with AFT & EFF

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/5hyvxjton/20160909223231_1.jpg[/img]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/p0jq1tk3r/Requirements.png[/img]
Dawnguard & Dragonborn

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/x4ru6k6iv/Recommended.png[/img]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]XPMSE[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?]FaceLight[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76051/?]Are You There[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75951/?]Fix Lip Sync[/url]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/qn8xn1w5j/KnownIssues.png[/img]
All three together can be hard on certain computers so please be aware of your computer's limits when using.

*If You Have The Individual Followers Installed, I Highly Recommend Removing Before Installing Pack*

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/fz56o7m6f/Installation.png[/img]
Manual or your favorite mod manager.

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/x7bptea6f/Uninstall.png[/img]
Manual or your favorite mod manger.
